publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2665 Peter Peacock: Gaelic Language (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Gaelic Language (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Euan Robson* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S2M-2665 Peter Peacock: Gaelic Language (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Gaelic Language (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Euan Robson
